short_summary: Design New Accommodations Building at 19 Wing CFB Comox, BC Canada
description: Design New Accommodation Building, 19 Wing CFB Comox, BC.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement for Design New Accommodations Building — CX220903**

**Reference Number**: MX-22612233608
**Amendment Number**: 5
**Solicitation Number**: CX220903-78933
**Publication Date**: November 7, 2022
**Tender Closing Date**: January 10, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
**Expected Contract Start Date**: May 1, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date**: May 1, 2023
**Tender Status**: Expired

**Description**
Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is issuing a Request for Abbreviated Proposals (RFAP) for Architectural and Engineering Consultant Services for the design of a new accommodation building at 19 Wing CFB Comox, British Columbia. The estimated construction cost of this project is in the order of magnitude of $6,000,000.00.

**Notice Details**

* Tender closing date: January 10, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* Notice URL: [https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2334567006/abstract?language=EN](https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2334567006/abstract?language=EN) and [https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2334567006/abstract?language=FR](https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2334567006/abstract?language=FR)
* Contact information: Anne Mccuaig, [Anne.Mccuaig@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:Anne.Mccuaig@dcc-cdc.gc.ca), 613-794-5281

**Project Details**

* Project category: SRV (Services)
* Trade agreements: CETA, WTO GPA, and CFTA
* Regions of opportunity: None
* Regions of delivery: None

**Services Required**

* Preparation of a concept, design development, and construction documents
* Assistance during the tender call and construction phases

**Evaluation Criteria**

* Information provided by proponents will be evaluated using established criteria in the RFAP

**Availability of Documents**

* Bidding and documents are available on [http://www.merx.com](http://www.merx.com)
* Fees may apply; please see [https://www.merx.com/public/pricing](https://www.merx.com/public/pricing) for more information.
